title: SakiFi
description: A practical reference platform for Sharia-compliant financial transactions, featuring articles, documents, and trusted source references.

title: Mojepict
description: A versatile collection of online tools designed to simplify everyday tasks, from quick editing to other handy utilities.

title: Randomix
description: A smart and fun platform for generating random yet balanced teams. Users can input player names along with skill levels (beginner, intermediate, pro), and Randomix creates fair and competitive matchups with evenly distributed opponents.

title: Voyage Pulse
description: A lightweight analytics dashboard that tracks website visits, page activity, outbound link clicks, downloads, and user geolocation data. Voyage Pulse provides actionable insights in a simple and intuitive interface.
tech: CSS, JavaScript, Ant Design, React.js, Supabase, Node.js
